description: Learn how to make perfect crackling with our easy pork belly recipe. It's teamed with a nectarine salad which complements the richness of the pork roast.
keywords: Roast Pork Belly With Warm Nectarine & Rocket Salad
name: Roast Pork Belly With Warm Nectarine & Rocket Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine mustard and remaining oil in a small saucepan. Heat over low heat for 2 minutes or until warm. Remove pan from heat and stir in vinegar. Season. Combine nectarines and rocket in a medium bowl, then transfer to platter and drizzle with a little of the dressing. Slice pork and serve with remaining dressing.
